title: Abelian sandpile model
summary: The Abelian sandpile model (ASM) is the more popular name of the original Bak–Tang–Wiesenfeld model (BTW). BTW model was the first discovered example of a dynamical system displaying self-organized criticality.  It was introduced by Per Bak, Chao Tang and Kurt Wiesenfeld in a 1987 paper.[1]
